summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Seventy-fifth Street to East Eightieth Street; and East Eightieth Street, from Fifteenth Avenue Northeast to Eighteenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing wooden walks and crosswalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1630 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
